Author: Mark81#4505
Content: @BoBot-BUY KMD  you are trying to active native mode for your wallet?

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Crashing might be happen due to bad exit from native mode and because of that your downloaded blockchain files being corrupt.

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: I had last week problem with verus native mode. I had to remove blockchain files and install them from bootstrap and after that wallet loaded fine. Another way is to remove blockchain files and just let wallet to resync but it takes some time.

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Blockchain files for agama  verus coin are in folder %appdata%\komodo\VRSC

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Inside that folder you need to backup wallet.dat file into safe place. And after that AND only after that you can remove everything else EXCEPT  wallet.dat file. (Taking copy is precaution if worst happens since it hold coins and losing that causes PERMANENT loss of your coins). Now after that you can unzip verus bootstrap to this same folder or just start agama and it starts resync).

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: Take note also that %appdata%\komodo holds komodos blochain files and ALSO its ASSETCHAIN files in subdirectories like for verus in under VRSC so you must be careful when you play with these since those holds all information to coins in wallet.dat files.

Author: Mark81#4505
Content: https://veruscoin.io/downloads/how-to/how-to_bootstrap.html
